  physical_appearance: This is a chakla or a hanging textile. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The chakla is decorated with stylized depictions of elephants
 flowers
 and horse carriages surrounding a deity in the center. The chakla is pentagonal in shape
 with a triangular top and square bottom.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a chakla or a hanging textile. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The chakla is decorated with stylized depictions of elephants, flowers, and horse carriages surrounding a deity in the center. The chakla is pentagonal in shape, with a triangular top and square bottom.
